creator: jspears@astrology.com
text:
Allow data to be retrieved from XML files using an XPath function.  This should
allow someone to specify an XML file and an XPath, then loop through the data in
a similar manor as CVSParser.

creator: jspears@astrology.com
text:
Created attachment 13945
XPath function implementation

This is based on CVSRead, but instead uses XML and XPath to retrieve data.

creator: jspears@astrology.com
text:
Created attachment 13946
XPath Function file container

XPath function FileContainer based on the FileRowColContainer

creator: jspears@astrology.com
text:
Created attachment 13947
Tar of XPath Function Implementation

This file contains 3 files that are used to implement XPath functions... Very
Very similar to CVS functions.

creator: jspears@astrology.com
text:
Created attachment 13948
Update to docs and messages.properties

This is a patch to the functions, and message resources, to make the other
files
included work.

Thanks! I'll be adding it to branch 2.0 shortly.

There was an extraneous </property> tag in the function.xml patch.

I've had to change the JUnit tests to use "../build.xml" instead of "build.xml",
because JMeter test runs always start from the the bin directory.
creator: sebb@apache.org
